sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_f018b3dddb73f3c0d033df8b4b961909
sys_update_xml.payload: customc.x_pisn_sp_pdf_view { overflow: hidden; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto; text-align: center; } .pdf-viewer-modal { margin-bottom: -7px; } .left a { margin-right: 10px; } input { color: $brand-primary; height: 19px; padding: 0; border: 0; background-color: rgba(245, 245, 245, 1); border-radius: 4px; text-align: center; min-width: 20px; } @media (max-width: 760px) { div.mb2 { text-align: left; padding: 0px 10px; } .left a { margin-right: 10px; } .check-mobile { display: none; } } sp_instancefalsex_pisn_sp_pdf_viewfalseSP PDF Viewerfalsefalsesp_widgetfabio2019-09-09 16:03:31f018b3dddb73f3c0d033df8b4b961909174SP PDF Viewerd6c67bd5db73f3c0d033df8b4b961956d6c67bd5db73f3c0d033df8b4b961956sp_widget_f018b3dddb73f3c0d033df8b4b961909fabio2019-09-20 09:51:17
